original_title: Struggle to Survive: The Lives of Four Girls Over Ten Years
overview: Four baby girls, Noelia, Secre, Daniela, and Alaishri were born in 2005 into extreme poverty on four different continents. This documentary follows them over the first year of their lives and then returns to find them again ten years later.
title: Struggle to Survive: The Lives of Four Girls Over Ten Years
